name: videoranking
description: ideas: - auth with username/password - admin page to make new ranking category/video idea - on admin page, set vars like how many vids each person submits - on users page, submit list of youtube video links - preview of video thumbnail to make sure video is right - on ranking page, embed youtube video and give scale to rank it - ability to go back or go to next video, then submit them all - on admin/final page, ability to see average scores for each video - on admin page when creating playlist, selection for whether or not submitter's score is used for average - stretch goal: button to download each video (would have to research youtube api)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
